articles.title: Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan Tours Pyongyang
articles.content:
Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan Tours Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- A congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea led by Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, visited the Party Founding Museum.
					 The group members saw revolutionary relics and historic materials on display there to convey the exploits President Kim Il Sung performed by successfully carrying out the historic cause of founding the Party.
					
					 Their visit to the Pyongyang Baby Home and Orphanage convinced them that the future of the great Paektusan power will be more bright thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They also toured the historic site associated with the Fatherland Liberation War, the Pyongyang Home for the Aged and the Jangchon Vegetable Co-op Farm in Sadong District.

articles.title: Self-Defence Capabilities Guarantee Nation's Prosperity: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Self-Defence Capabilities Guarantee Nation's Prosperity: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea has pursued the military line for self-defence and the line of simultaneously building up the economy and defence, thereby increasing the capabilities for national defence in every way and making the miserable fate the Korean Peninsula had undergone as a theater for fierce scramble of big powers from its geopolitical position a thing in the past. This is the distinguished feats the WPK performed before the country and the nation.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an article says in this regard:
					
					 The military line for self-defence is the dignity and sovereignty of Songun Korea.
					
					 Arms mean the sovereignty and the nation's life. This is a bitter lesson taught by the past that without the arms one can not but lead a life of a slave. This is also the truth proved by the present world where high-handed and arbitrary practices are rampant.
					
					 The DPRK's final victory is firmly guaranteed by the capabilities for self-defence based on the nuclear deterrent. 
					
					 Our arms consolidated in tempests of history serve as the eternal strength for preserving peace on the Korean Peninsula and a basic guarantee of the final victory of Songun Korea.
					
					 Our party has consistently held fast to the line and principle of giving priority to the military affairs, put forward the building of revolutionary armed forces and the bolstering of the country's defence capabilities as the priority of the state affairs and won a victory after another in the confrontation with the imperialist allied forces by relying on the powerful defence capabilities with the Korean People's Army as a core.
					
					 The dignity, sovereignty and eternal prosperity of the nation will be firmly guaranteed under the leadership of the invincible WPK along with the might of ever-thriving Songun Korea.

articles.title: U.S. Ruin Is Stern Declaration of History: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Ruin Is Stern Declaration of History: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- The U.S. position on the present international arena has been steadily sinking and its unchallenged position will end after decades, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. end predicted by the international community and even within the U.S. is the stern declaration of the history.
					
					 Aggression wars, military pressure, interference in internal affairs and economic sanctions are the main factors that have led the U.S. structure of hegemony to its end.
					
					 The U.S. fought many wars after the end of the Cold War.
					
					 In the new century, it has become evermore undisguised in its high-handed and arbitrary practices, aggression and war moves.
					
					 The U.S. has made no scruple to realize its ambition for hegemony. It is out of question that the international community would not keep mum about its moves.
					
					 Many countries have risen up against the U.S. hegemony.
					
					 Cooperation has been strengthened among countries concerned about the U.S. military hegemony.
					
					 The military capabilities that the U.S. regards as the main pillar of its world domination fail to prop up the rickety American empire.
					
					 Militarization of economy is plunging the debt-ridden U.S. economy into a catastrophe.
					
					 The U.S. committed wars in Afghanistan and Iraq which are no match for it, but the war theaters have become the traps that pushed the policy of strength enforced by the "only superpower in the world" to bankruptcy.
					
					 The present international financial and monetary system with the U.S. dollar as a main currency is shaking down to the roots.
					
					 Many countries are willing to sit with the U.S. on an equal basis and if not, they refuse to deal with the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. arbitrary practice and big show rampant in the international arena are no more than the last-ditch efforts of the empire. 
					
					 Those who attempt to bring the trend of the history for independence back to the past will fall into a ditch of the history.

articles.title: Minju Joson Terms S. Korean Chief Executive's Ambition for "Unification through Absorption" Pipedream
articles.content:
Minju Joson Terms S. Korean Chief Executive's Ambition for "Unification through Absorption" Pipedrea
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- The south Korean chief executive in her recent talks with the German president talked about "the process of German unification", "the process of phased confidence-building through exchange and cooperation" and "building up of support from neighboring countries". Not content with this, she begged for "support" and "cooperation" while talking about the "north's abandonment of nuclear weapons" and "improvement of human rights performance."
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Sunday terms this another politically-motivated provocation. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The "process of German unification" is contrary to the north-south agreement, the reality of the Korean Peninsula and the aspiration of the Korean nation. Her remarks are sophism aimed to bring down the DPRK and realize "unification of social systems" and "unification through absorption" by following in the footsteps of Germany.
					
					 Her talk about "the north's abandonment of nuclear program" and the "improvement of human rights performance" is also aimed to achieve the "unification through absorption". 
					
					 A new war, nuclear war, has been averted on the Korean Peninsula as the DPRK has built up a nuclear deterrence for self-defense by tightening its belt. The assertion that the north should "abandon" the nuclear deterrence is nothing but rubbish meant to plunge the nation into a nuclear war.
					
					 Obsessed by the ambition for "unification through absorption", she is still seeking "international cooperation" and "confrontation with compatriots.
					
					 But her ambition is a pipedream.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Trying to Allow Japan's Reinvasion
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Trying to Allow Japan's Reinvasion
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on Oct. 15 to hit out at the authorities for going to allow Japan's reinvasion.
					 Speakers recalled that the "prime minister" let loose a spate of balderdash allowing the reinvasion of the Korean Peninsula by the Japan "Self-Defense Forces". The navy chief of staff said it is necessary to have Japan involved in Key Resolve military exercise in order to deter the north, they charged.
					
					 The present regime has already taken the stand of allowing SDF's re-dispatch to the Korean Peninsula, they said.
					
					 They demanded the chief executive immediately relieve the "prime minister" of his post and clarify the stand of not allowing Japan's exercise of the "right to collective self-defense" and reinvasion of the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: S. Korean Workers Launch Strike
articles.content:
S. Korean Workers Launch Strike
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- 10,000 odd public workers launched a strike in south Korea Thursday amid intensified struggle of all workers in protest against the regime's unpopular policy, according to the south Korean internet paper Voice of People.
					 They gathered at Jongro District, Seoul and held a meeting.
					
					 Speakers blamed the regime for pushing ahead with the system for introducing "state-compiled history textbooks" in a bid to embellish "yusin" dictatorship and justify its retrogressive revision of the labor law.
					
					 If the regime fails to stop the retrogressive revision of the labor law, it will be punished by all workers and other people, they warned.
					
					 At the end of the meeting the participants marched toward Chonggye Square.

articles.title: Compatriots' Paper Marks Anniversaries of WPK Founding and October 4 Declaration
articles.content:
Compatriots' Paper Marks Anniversaries of WPK Founding and October 4 Declaration 
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Thongil, the paper of the International United Confederation of Koreans, carried special write-ups on Oct. 8 on the occasions of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 8th anniversary of the publication of the October 4 declaration.
					 The paper carried a photo of leader Kim Jong Il meeting with the south Korean "President" Roh Moo Hyun in Pyongyang in October, 2007.
					
					 It edited the full text of "Declaration for Development of North-South Relations and Peace and Prosperity ".
					
					 It carried a photo of the Monument to Party Founding on the occasion of the 70th birthday of the WPK.
					
					 An article titled "70th founding anniversary of the WPK" said the WPK founded on Oct. 10, 1945 is the organizer and guide of all victories of the Korean people.
					
					 The paper noted that the north-south summit was provided in Pyongyang eight years ago and the October 4 declaration was adopted.

articles.title: Celebrations Held in United Confederation of Koreans in Kyrgyzstan
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Austria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Austria 
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Organizes and Guides All the Victories of Our People" was published in booklet by an Austrian publishing house on October 6.
					 The work published on Oct. 3, Juche 79 (1990) clarifies the idea that the party's leadership is a sure guarantee for the victory of the socialist cause and deals with the issue of developing the Workers' Party of Korea into the Juche-type revolutionary party and clarifies basic ways for the party to fulfill its mission and duty as a political leadership body.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Angola
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Angola
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Step Up the Building of a Thriving Country by Applying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism" was published in booklet by the National Publishing House of Angola. 
					 The work, published on July 26, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the essence of leader Kim Jong Il's patriotism and his noble life for the country and its people. It also clarifies important issues of embodying Kim Jong Il's patriotism. 
					
					 A book releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on October 8.

articles.title: WPK's Birthday Marked by Int'l Body
articles.content:
WPK's Birthday Marked by Int'l Body
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- A floral basket was laid before the portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung by the Organization of Solidarity of the Peoples of Africa, Asia and Latin America on October 9 on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 Present at the event were the secretary general and members of the organization and Pak Chang Yul, DPRK ambassador to Cuba, and his embassy officials. 
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket before the portrait of the President and paid tribute to him.

articles.title: Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Work Held in Germany
Foreign Party Media Observe WPK's Birthday
articles.content:
Foreign Party Media Observe WPK's Birthday
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Organs and websites of political parties of different countries carried special write-ups on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The Central Committee of the Communist Party of Venezuela in its organ on Oct. 10 carried an article titled "70 years of ever-victorious WPK" illustrated with photos of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It said:
					
					 It was the motto of Kim Il Sung that the one who believes in the people and relies on their strength would emerge victorious while the one who is alienated from them and forsaken by them would lose a hundred times.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, who personified the President's idea of believing in the people as in heaven, paid deep attention to developing the WPK into the mother party that takes care of the people's destiny in a responsible manner.
					
					 First Secretary Kim Jong Un advanced the slogan "Everything for the People and Everything by Relying on Them!" and has pursued the policy of loving the people and attaching importance to them by successfully carrying forward the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The organ of the Algerian National Liberation Front Party on Oct. 10 carried an article titled "WPK greeting its 70th founding anniversary" which said that the WPK has led the socialist construction and the anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. struggle of the Korean people to victory for a long period since its foundation despite all storms and stresses of history.
					
					 The Hungarian Workers' Party and the Socialist Popular Party of Mexico posted on their websites on Oct. 2 and 6 articles praising the glorious 70 year-long history of the WPK that has carried forward the tradition of winning one victory after another.

articles.title: Foreign Party Delegations, Personages Pay Congratulatory Visits to DPRK Missions
articles.content:
Foreign Party Delegations, Personages Pay Congratulatory Visits to DPRK Missions
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Delegations of political parties and personages from all walks of life in different countries paid congratulatory visits to the DPRK missions in their countries from Oct. 7 to 10 on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 They included a delegation of the Uganda National Resistance Movement, a delegation of the Pakistan People's Party, the leader of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (United Marxist-Leninist), the general secretary of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), the leader of the Nepal Communist Party (United), the chairman of the Nepalese Association for Supporting the Songun Politics, the chairman of the Nepalese Committee for Promotion of Reunification of Korea, the chairman of the Hungarian Workers' Party, the general secretary of the Workers' Party of DR Congo, the chairman of the DR Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association, and other personages.
					
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and photos of the great leaders standing together and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The director of the Secretariat of the Uganda National Resistance Movement said that Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il were elder statesmen of the world who made contributions to the building of a revolutionary party.
					
					 The director of the Central Secretariat of the Pakistan People's Party said he was convinced that the Korean people would surely build a thriving socialist nation as desired by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il under the guidance of the WPK led by First Secretary Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Cuban Personage Reaffirms Support to WPK, Korean People
articles.content:
Cuban Personage Reaffirms Support to WPK, Korean People
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Havana on Oct. 9 under the sponsorship of the Communist Party of Cuba (CPC) in celebration of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Present there were a member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the CPC who doubles as vice-president of the Council of State and first secretary of the Havana Provincial Committee of the CPC, Kenia Serrano Puig, president of the Cuban Institute of Friendship with the Peoples, Ana Teresita Gonzalez, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, the secretary general of the Organziation of Solidarity of the Peoples of Africa, Asia and Latin America, and other personages concerned and more than 500 members of the CPC.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the DPRK ambassador to Cuba and his embassy officials.
					
					 A member of the Secretariat of the CPC Central Committee in a speech said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung put an end to the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule over Korea through armed struggle and founded the WPK, a vanguard unit for struggle, on Oct. 10, 1945, give a continuity to the revolutionary cause.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il rallied the people around the party true to the last instructions of the President and advanced the socialsit cause.
					
					 The CPC reaffirms its steady support to the WPK and the Korean people in their struggle to independently reunify the country free from outsiders' interference. 
					
					 At the end of the meeting, a performance was given by artistes of Cuba.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Sent to DPRK Missions in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Sent to DPRK Missions in Foreign Countries 
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Floral baskets sent by political parties, governments, ministries and personages of different social standings of Cuba, Iran and Syria were placed before portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and their full-length pictures at DPRK missions in those countries from October 6 to 10 in congratulation of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					 The floral baskets were sent by the Communist Party of Cuba, the Ministry of Revolutionary Armed Forces of Cuba, the Iranian Foreign Ministry, the minister of Foreign Affairs and the minister of Trade and Foreign Investment of Cuba, the deputy general secretary and the deputy regional secretary of the Baath Arab Socialist Party, the president of the People's Assembly of Syria, the deputy commander-in-chief of the Armed Forces of Syria, who is minister of Defence, the deputy prime minister who is minister of Foreign Affairs and Expatriates, the minister of Agriculture and Agrarian Reform and the chief of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Syria, the governor of Damascus, the chairman of the General Union of Syrian Peasants and others.

articles.title: EE.UU. no debe eludir concertacion de convenio de paz, subraya MINREX de RPDC
articles.content:
EE.UU. no debe eludir concertacion de convenio de paz, subraya MINREX de RPDC
Pyongyang, 18 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 17 la siguiente declaracion:
					Como trascendidos, en el 70o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU volvimos a exponer la justa posicion de sustituir el Acuerdo de Armisticio de Corea por un convenio de paz.
					
					Esto partio de la demanda apremiante de eliminar el peligro de estallido de guerra, que se presenta como una amenaza realista en la Peninsula Coreana, y preparar un duradero ambiente pacifico.
					
					La situacion de la Peninsula Coreana creada en agosto pasado, cuando un pequeno caso eventual se paso en un santiamen al umbral de la crisis mas tirante en un santiamen, ha demostrado finalmente que el actual Acuerdo de Armisticio no puede detener por mas tiempo el peligro de choque y guerra.
					
					Aunque fue logrado a duras penas el acuerdo entre ambas partes coreanas gracias a nuestra posicion amante de la paz y la paciencia indomable, no hay ninguna garantia de que eso seria mantenido invariablemente y ejecutado.
					
					Es porque las autoridades surcoreanas, parte firmante del acuerdo, no tienen el poder del mando supremo sobre cualesquiera fuerzas armadas en su territorio, ni negar ningun entrenamiento militar conjunto que les impone su amo gringo.
					
					Es muy claro que si se produce otro choque en la Linea de Demarcacion Militar al volver a agravarse la tension, eso pasara a la guerra total incontrolable por nadie.
					
					El curso de negociaciones realizadas hasta la fecha para solucionar el problema de la Peninsula Coreana demostro que ningun problema interesado por EE.UU. y otros paises involucrados puede ser resuelto sin anteponer la concertacion del convenio de paz.
					
					En el pasado, tomando en cuenta la insistencia de las partes interesadas en discutir primero el problema de desnuclearizacion, lo hicimos en las conversaciones a 6 bandas y tambien pusimos simultaneamente el problema nuclear y el asunto de aseguramiento de paz en la mesa. Pero, todo esto no pudo evitar el fracaso y alguna vez se lograron unos acuerdos parciales que no se llevaron a su ejecucion. 
					
					Su causa principal reside en que se continua la politica hostil anti-RPDC de Estados Unidos y que los actos provocadores militares como la realizacion de simulacros militares conjuntos de gran envergadura y la introduccion de medios de ataque nuclear en el suelo surcoreano rompieron periodicamente el ambiente de todas las negociaciones y empeoran mas la tension de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					De ahi, hemos sacado la conclusion de que hay que anteponer antes que todo la sustitucion del acuerdo de armisticio por el de paz para acabar con el circulo vicioso de la confrontacion y la agravacion de tension.
					
					Existen solo dos salidas para el aseguramiento de paz en la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Uno de ellos es el metodo de la guerra fria de impedir la creciente amenaza nuclear y la provocacion de guerra de EE.UU. intensificando por todos los medios el poderio de defensa nacional de caracter autodefensivo que tiene como nucleo las armas nucleares.
					
					La situacion actual en que se previene la guerra total en la Peninsula Coreana que esta en el estado de armisticio se mantiene enteramente gracias al disuasivo nuclear de la RPDC.
					
					El otro metodo es que Estados Unidos renuncie su politica hostil anti-RPDC y acepte la concertacion de convenio de paz con la RPDC para establecer la verdadera y duradera paz basada en la confianza.
					
					La sustitucion del acuerdo de armisticio por el de paz deviene el problema dependiente de la decision resuelta de EE.UU. y el acuerdo de principios entre la RPDC y EE.UU.
					
					Tambien, la ONU debe apoyar activamente la concertacion de convenio de paz cumpliendo su rol para acabar con el estado anormal en que un pais miembro y la "comandancia de las fuerzas de la ONU" estan en estado beligerante en la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Si pueden eliminar la causa raigal de la guerra inminente creando confianza entre la RPDC y Estados Unidos sera posible poner fin a la carrera armamentista nuclear y consolidar la paz. 
					
					Estados Unidos no debe esforzarse mas por evitar sin consideracion la concertacion del convenio de paz y debe tomar con prudencia la opcion correcta. 
					
					Si Estados Unidos da la vista gorda a este asunto o le pone las condiciones hasta hoy en dia en que la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana llego a un punto de viraje crucial, revelara solamente a todo mundo el hecho de que no tiene voluntad de abandonar la politica hostil a la RPDC.
					
					Si EE.UU. no abandona hasta el fin su politica hostil, experimentara solamente la intensificacion continua del inagotable disuasivo nuclear de la RPDC y se enfrentara con las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias coreanas que estan preparadas a las guerras de todo tipo que les impone el imperio.

articles.title: MINREX de RPDC rechaza histeria de "DDHH" anti-RPDC de fuerzas hostiles
articles.content:
MINREX de RPDC rechaza histeria de "DDHH" anti-RPDC de fuerzas hostiles
Pyongyang, 18 de octubre (ACNC) -- En relacion con que las fuerzas hostiles presentaron ante la ONU un "proyecto de resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio el dia 17 a una pregunta formulada por la ACNC la siguiente respuesta:
					Bajo la manipulacion de Estados Unidos, la UE y Japon hacen negociaciones volviendo a aprobar un "proyecto de resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC en el 70o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU.
					
					Esto es una vil conspiracion de Estados Unidos y sus fuerzas seguidoras que fomentan de nuevo la confrontacion anti-RPDC en la escena de la ONU.
					
					EE.UU. es el peor abusador de DDHH, y pais criminal que debe ser tratado ahora mismo en la ONU.
					
					El imperio yanqui comete sin vacilacion alguna en distintas partes del mundo los actos antieticos tales como la agresion, la guerra y el homicidio y pisotea despiadadamente el derecho a existencia y vida del ser humano.
					
					Aplasto con tanque a las dos alumnas transeuntes en el Sur de Corea, asesino sin ton ni son a los inocentes civiles en Irak y Afganistan e incluso bombardeo intencionalmente a un hospital matando innumerables ninos y otros pacientes. Y cometio las torturas medievales a las personas en las carceles instaladas en secreto en otros paises.
					
					La discriminacion racial y el asesinato de los policias contra los negros son cosas comunes en el suelo norteamericano y los delitos con armas se cometen diariamente dando a las personas el pavor a la muerte.
					
					Tal situacion es igual tambien en la Union Europea que habla tanto de la proteccion de DDHH y el humanitarismo.
					
					Es Europa donde se produjo una tragedia humanitaria al no tomar las medidas merecidas en vez de proteger a los refugiados del Medio Oriente en busca de medios de subsistencia. Esos refugiados fueron tratados como equipajes y al final murieron a masas debido a la sofocacion.
					
					Sin embargo, la UE esta con bocas cerradas ante la agresion y violacion de DDHH de EE.UU. que engendro el problema de refugiados.
					
					A pesar de que no controla los quehaceres internos, la UE habla tanto del "problema de DDHH" de alguien siguiendo a ciegas a EE.UU.
					
					Para realizar el verdadero dialogo y colaboracion en la esfera de DDHH, estamos mostrando la maxima sinceridad invitando en estos dias al representante plenipotenciario encargado de DDHH de la UE y el alto comisionado de la ONU para los DDHH. 
					
					Pero, la UE rechazo la oferta de la RPDC de organizar el encuentro con los familiares de los "fugitivos norcoreanos" en cuestion y cancelo unilateralmente la visita a la RPDC del representante plenipotenciario ya acordada. Y se entrega a la farsa de la aprobacion de "proyecto de resolucion" anti-RPDC, trenzada con los "informes" de contenidos falsos que se portaban durante mas de 10 anos.
					
					Es hipocresia y climax de terquedad la actitud de la UE que depende solo de los datos fraudulentos elaborados por las fuerzas hostiles dando vista gorda a la realidad de la RPDC.
					
					Japon toma la delantera en el "alboroto de DDHH" anti-RPDC. Intenta encubrir sus crimenes antieticos del pasado y ganar el provecho politico al difamar el prestigio de la RPDC con la instigacion persistente a la UE.
					
					La UE y Japon deben abandonar ahora mismo tal intento imprudente y abordar primero los espantosos problemas de DDHH del Occidente como la violacion anti-DDHH de EE.UU. y el caso de refugiados en Europa. 
					
					Nunca se toleraran tales viles actos de los responsables de violacion de DDHH que cuestionan a otros al igual que un incendiario grita primero "!Fuego!"
					
					La presente Asamblea General de la ONU debera convertirse en un escenario en que todos los paises amantes de la justicia y la paz denuncien los paises violadores de DDHH inclusive EE.UU.
					
					La RPDC frustrara hasta el final con la resuelta medida superintransigente el imprudente alboroto de "DDHH" anti-RPDC de las fuerzas hostiles.
